publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3886 Jackie Baillie: Encouraging Sport for Young People—That the Parliament believes that it is essential for the Scottish Executive to provide opportunities for children to become more active and lead healthier lives; recognises that considerable effort has gone into ensuring a level of physical activity in schools; notes, however, that improvements can still be made, particularly in primary schools, and urges the Executive to develop sporting opportunities in local communities in partnership with sports organisations, such as football clubs, in order to maximise the provision of community facilities and share the wealth of experience available in local areas.

S2M-3886 Jackie Baillie: Encouraging Sport for Young People—That the Parliament believes that it is essential for the Scottish Executive to provide opportunities for children to become more active and lead healthier lives; recognises that considerable effort has gone into ensuring a level of physical activity in schools; notes, however, that improvements can still be made, particularly in primary schools, and urges the Executive to develop sporting opportunities in local communities in partnership with sports organisations, such as football clubs, in order to maximise the provision of community facilities and share the wealth of experience available in local areas. Supported by: Marlyn Glen*, Paul Martin*, Sarah Boyack*, Bill Butler*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Michael McMahon*, Mike Pringle*, Ms Sandra White*, Shona Robison*, Trish Godman*, Margaret Jamieson*, Robin Harper*
S2M-3886 Encouraging Sport for Young People (lodged on 26 January 2006) Alex Neil*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Susan Deacon*, Brian Adam*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-3886 Encouraging Sport for Young People (lodged on 26 January 2006) Rob Gibson*, Michael Matheson*, Irene Oldfather*, Maureen Macmillan*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3886 Encouraging Sport for Young People (lodged on 26 January 2006) Chris Ballance*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3886 Encouraging Sport for Young People (lodged on 26 January 2006) Shiona Baird*, Donald Gorrie*, Dennis Canavan*, John Swinburne*
S2M-3886 Encouraging Sport for Young People (lodged on 26 January 2006) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-3886 Encouraging Sport for Young People (lodged on 26 January 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-3886 Encouraging Sport for Young People (lodged on 26 January 2006) Pauline McNeill*
